ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:08:49 [Issue ID 4000-389576] urn:comicvine:4000-389576
ComicInfo.Summary:
Collects GRIMM FAIR TALES: INFERNO, plus a bonus cover gallery and GRIMM FAIRY TALES issues #29 and #41! All new Grimm Fairy Tales Collection! Grace is lost and restless in a big city where her nightmares seem all too real. Suffering from a form of amnesia, she only feels empty and confused. Her therapist overmedicates, her boss sexually harasses her and her boyfriend beats her. The world is quickly closing in around Grace but when she learns the truth of her past she might just find the power within to redeem her life and battle her demons...but only if she has the courage to face them in the Inferno.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-11-13 09:01:30. [Issue ID 389576]
